Text.Page:
Those blasted colossal argons! They're inflicting horrific casualties on our forces. Put a stop to it!

Kill any gilgash guardians and akalath devastators you find.

Report to Sistiren at Khanovar Citadel when your mission is complete.
Akalaths and gilgashes? Impressive bit of fighting! Thank you!
It doesn't look like you've completed your objectives.
